Filed under Portfolio
August 2013 Hummingbird Logo

Hummingbird is a passionate online community who share, rate, review, and talk about anime. It was started in late 2012 by the talented entrepeneur and self-declared anime-nerd, Josh Fabian.

Josh asked me to give a facelift to his brand’s Hummingbird’s logo, which is a standalone icon, He wanted clean and minimal. He wanted something in the style close to Hummingbird: Thin contour lines and sharp details. It was important that the logo work at small and large scales, and black and white.

After some inital exploration, I put together something I was proud of. It took the length of Inglorious Basterds to do.

You can see it in all it glory on www.hummingbird.me.

Josh Martin
About

I am a Designer, Illustrator, & Front-End Developer from Pittsburgh living in downtown Chicago. I currently work independently, focusing on web/app UI/UX and creative direction for startups.
